price: Así será la disputa entre los moradores del Infierno.
arabic: إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ لَحَقّٞ تَخَاصُمُ أَهۡلِ ٱلنَّارِ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: inna dhālika laḥaqqun takhāṣumu ahli al-nāri
